title: Australian leaders reflect on Nelson Mandela's struggle against apartheid
abstract: South Africans are awakening to the news that their former president Nelson Mandela has died at the age of 95. title: Federal Government orders investigation into undetected asylum seeker boat
abstract: The Federal Government has ordered an investigation into how an asylum seeker boat was able to arrive at Christmas Island and remain undetected for several days. Labor says the issue raises questions about the effectiveness of the Government's military-led response to asylum seeker boats.
